Thanks Wesley,

We still have some issues regrading this. We would like to
run ONLY the best genome in some sort of a loop.
meaning we would like to run our simulation as fast as possible without
any animation and after reaching our desired results, we would like to only
show
the animation of our best run.
We are also using the sharpneat GUI provided in order to run our
simulation.

Thanks again,

Ori

--14dae9340c498c1abd04c0139c76
